attributes.action: make Joanna Lumley the actress a Dame.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please make Joanna Lumley the actress a Dame in the New Years Honours List to show recognition for her tireless support for the Gurkhas.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
